item.title: About me
item.author: jespasareig@gmail.com (Josep Espasa Reig)
item.description: Welcome to my blog! My name is Josep Espasa and I’m a London-based data analyst currently working as a Senior Statistician at NatCen. Passionate about data, R enthusiast and occasional Lindy-Hopper. We might have crossed paths at a LondonR meeting or a RSS event. About This Site This blog is built with blogdown and Hugo using the Blackburn theme. All blog posts are released under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

item.title: You didn't like the 7th season of GoT? This might be why
item.author: jespasareig@gmail.com (Josep Espasa Reig)
item.description: Introduction My main reason to love Game of Thrones (GoT) is that is a serie with ruthless and unpredictable narratives. It shows a world with a large amount of rich and absorbing characters that are always on the edge between life and death. Criticism sparked after the last two seasons were aired1. The show seems to have become more fast-paced, spending less time in slowly-building complex stories and more in action-like scenes.
